data.Title: Google Search Updates
data.Description: Google Search has seen intense ranking volatility, deepfake search algorithm updates, autocomplete prediction changes, and a new "Explore more with search" carousel.

data.Title: Google Ads Updates
data.Description: Google Ads is experiencing an outage impacting ad reporting and some interfaces. Other updates include a new automated lead credit system for Local Service Ads, a 2.5% surcharge for Canadian advertisers, the removal of AI-based theming with separate ad groups, and the allowance of pubic hair grooming service ads in September.

data.Title: OpenAI's SearchGPT Blocked by News Sites
data.Description: Several top news sites, including The New York Times, have blocked OpenAI's new SearchGPT web crawling bot from accessing their content.

data.Title: Google Acquires Character.AI Assets
data.Description: Google has agreed to pay a licensing fee to chatbot maker Character.AI for its models and will hire its cofounders and many of its researchers.

data.Title: Game Informer Shut Down by GameStop
data.Description: GameStop has shut down Game Informer, the longest-running gaming magazine in the US, after 33 years.

data.Title: Reddit Restricts Search Engine Access
data.Description: Reddit is blocking search engines, including Microsoft Bing, from accessing its content unless they pay for commercial agreements. The move comes as Reddit seeks to prevent companies from using its data to train AI models without permission.

data.Title: Google Combats Deepfakes
data.Description: Google has updated its algorithms to demote deepfake content in Google Search and expanded its "About this image" feature to provide more context about images, including potential deepfakes.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing's AI-Powered Search
data.Description: Microsoft Bing is showcasing the capabilities of AI-powered search engines with its latest features and updates.

data.Title: Outbrain Acquires Teads
data.Description: Outbrain has acquired Teads in a deal valued at over $1 billion.

data.Title: Wix Launches AI-Powered Blog Post Writer
data.Description: Wix has announced a new AI tool that automates the process of creating blog posts, including SEO keyword integration.
